name: Is UCC?
rule: UCC Article 2 governs contracts for the sale of GOODS, movable things at the time of identification to the contract. Otherwise, only COMMON LAW governs the contract.
elementsQuestions: Here the contract is for sale of a movable things because it is for sale of widgets and widgets are movable because it has to be transported to buyer's place.
Or Here the contract is not for the sale of movable things because it is for painting job and painting job is not movable.
conclusion: Therefore, this was a contract for a sale of goods and the UCC governs. or Therefore Common Law governs this contract.

sample_essays.hypo: Jen has a clothing store and he sells lot of jeans and t-shirts. Amar has "bought lot of jeans" in his life time and he went to Jen to buy jeans.
sample_essays.explanation:
UCC Article 2 governs contracts for the sale of GOODS, movable things at the time of identification to the contract. Otherwise, only COMMON LAW governs the contract.

Here the contract is for sale of a movable things because it is for sale of jeans and jeans are movable because it has to be transported to buyer's place.

Therefore, this was a contract for a sale of goods and the UCC governs.
